item.title: Resources
item.description:
Resource aggregators
  • PhD Resources of Guillaume Dalle: Collection of cool resources, websites and software to improve your workflow and make your life easier!
  • Awesome PhD by Helena Hartmann: A curated list of carefully selected tools and resources I wish I knew when starting my PhD.
